comment.author: Brenna
comment.text: Hillarys long term assistant has ties to terrorist and it's money

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: No, it is she that has the ties!

replies.author: Brenna
replies.text: We know that... But so does her assistant Huma Abedin.. Research her

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Oh, and her husband too. How else do you think they got that giant house for their daughter way out on Eastern Long Island. My hudband did not know whonthere daughter was, and he was guardig that hoise while it was being built. One day, he saw her on TV actually at the debate and said "I know this girl. I saw her before." So, I said it is the Clinton's daughter and he said she was the one coming to the house. He even said hello, and he was not aware who she was because he is from Italy and has his test coming up for citizenship really soon! Going to celebrate at the Statue of Liberty.
